CHAT.comment: ANTHONY HEDGPETH, WARDEN, Petitioner v. MICHAEL ROBERT PULIDO.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEREMY FRIEDLANDER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF PRATIK A. SHAH ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF J. BRADLEY O'CONNELL ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF JEREMY FRIEDLANDER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:50 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
